  • Method Details

    • root

      public static File root()
      Returns the root of the openLCA data folder.

    • setRoot

      public static void setRoot​(File dir)
      Set the given folder as the root folder of the openLCA data directory.

    • databases

      public static File databases()
      Get the `databases` folder in which the we store our database data where each databases has its separate folder.

    • getDatabaseDir

      public static File getDatabaseDir​(String name)
      Get the folder of the database with the given name in the openLCA data folder. Note that the returned folder may not exist if there is no such database in that folder.

    • libraries

      public static File libraries()
      Get the `libraries` folder in which data libraries are stored where each data library is stored in its separate folder.
